name: The Floor is Lava | Demo
description:
Welcome! 

This page is for a game demo I have created as part of my university course. 

The Floor is Lava is a 2D platforming demo inspired by those childhood memories of jumping between furniture avoiding touching the lava at all costs. 

The goal of the demo is to get from start to finish while collecting three toys hidden throughout the level.

Controls (Windows/macOS)

Move LeftaMove RightdJumpspaceInteractleft click

Controls (Android)

The Android build of this demo uses a touch joystick and a jump button.

Dev Notes

The focus of this project was to design a 2D platformer, thus code was provided for us. This is simply a test of my abilities and creativity - please enjoy!

You may view the documentation of workflow through my portfolio on my Behance page.

Credits

Audio content and font used are royalty-free and are credited on my Benhance page. The code used in this demo was provided by the University of Gloucestershire. Everything else has been created by myself.
